verses.verse: Judge <WH8199> me <WH430>, O God, and plead <WH7378> my cause <WH7379> against a ungodly <WH3808> nation <WH1471>: O deliver <WH6403> me from the deceitful <WH4820> and unjust <WH5766> man <WH376>.
For you are the God <WH430> of my strength <WH4581>: why do you cast me off <WH2186>? why go <WH1980> I mourning <WH6937> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy <WH341>?
O send out <WH7971> your light <WH216> and your truth <WH571>: let them lead <WH5148> me <WH935>; let them bring me unto your holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>, and to your tabernacles <WH4908>.

Then will I go <WH935> unto the altar <WH4196> of God <WH430>, unto God <WH410> my exceedingly <WH8057> joy <WH1524>: Yes <WH3658>, upon the harp will I praise <WH3034> you <WH430>, O God my God <WH430>.

Why are you cast down <WH7817>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why are you disquieted <WH1993> inside me <WH3176>? hope in God <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> him <WH3444>, who is the health of my favor <WH6440>, and my God <WH430>.
